getByMACAddress.map: function(doc) {if(!("known_mac_addresses" in doc)) {return;}for(var m=0; m<doc.known_mac_addresses.length; m++) {emit(doc.known_mac_addresses[m], doc);}}

getByBSSID.map: function(doc) {if(!("known_bssids" in doc)) {return;}for(var m=0; m<doc.known_bssids.length; m++) {emit(doc.known_bssids[m], doc);}}

getByCellID.map: function(doc) {if(!("known_cell_ids" in doc)) {return;}for(var m=0; m<doc.known_cell_ids.length; m++) {emit(doc.known_cell_ids[m], doc);}}
